Name: Wizard Bros
About the game: Wizard Bros is a fun multiplayer PvP Party Brawler where you battle it out the against evil snowmen as well your own Wizard Bros. Fight it out against your friends or find random Wizard Bros from around the world! Up to 4 players online multiplayer fun With Family And Friends Physics-Based fighting system Old School Level Design With Beautiful Modern Graphics
